name: jjs105 Development Container Base
description: Installs tools useful for development of development containers.

test-lib.description: Copy test-lib.sh to the container for future use.

ensure-bash.description: Ensure the Bash shell is installed.

expected_secrets.description: Secrets to expect either in ENV variables or /workspace/.jjs105-secrets file. Comma separated list.

shell_history_method.description: The method used to control shell history.

bash-history-path.description: The path to use shared shell history path (shared_file).

atuin_disable_up_arrow.description: When installing atuin disable the up arrow functionality.

atuin_enter_accept.description: When installing atuin set the enter_accept config value.

atuin_inline_height.description: When installing atuin set the inline_height config value.
